titles: The most famous and tragicall historie of Pelops and Hippodamia Whereunto are adioyned sundrie pleasant deuises, epigrams, songes and sonnettes. Written by Mathewe Groue.
author: Grove, Mathew.
Smith, Richard, fl. 1587.
publisher: By Abel Ieffs dwelling in the Forestreete without Creeplegate, neere vnto Grubstreete,
notes: Running title reads: The historie of Pelops and Hippodamia.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
